headline: Small-Cap Stocks Are Underloved. Why Their Time May Be Coming.
summary: Small-caps have underperformed large-caps for 12 years now, which means they’re very cheap and, as BofA notes, good in a stagflation economy and may even profit from artificial intelligence.

raw.headline: Small-Cap Stocks Are Underloved. Why Their Time May Be Coming.
raw.summary: Small-caps have underperformed large-caps for 12 years now, which means they’re very cheap and, as BofA notes, good in a stagflation economy and may even profit from artificial intelligence.

headline: S&P Giants And Record Highs
summary: Within the S&P 500, 32 stocks now have market caps of at least $250 billion. Of those, four have traded at all-time highs today. Click to read.

headline: IBM Surges 16% in Six Months: Is it Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: IBM surges 16% in six months as hybrid cloud and AI demand power growth, outpacing rivals despite margin pressures.
